case.state: Nice to meet you! I'm Arash!
Strip poker's a great way to unwind after a long day, isn't it?
It's nice to get a break from training.
Hmm, I think I'll go with ~cards~.
Let's swap ~cards~ and see what happens.
I like the look of these.
I like the look of this.
Second wind when I need it most! Nice!
Maybe I've got a shot after all.
A strong hand now, when I'm ready to just get this done with...
Of all the times to get a good hand...
Alright. I can work with this.
I've won with this before. I've lost with this before. Let's see what happens.
It's all up to fate now.
Guess I'll just have to wait and see.
I really hope this is enough to lose me the round.
Wish I could just get on with it already...
Not great, but it's no big deal.
This is going to be interesting.
Meh. Not really enthusiastic about this hand, y'know?
Not a strong hand, but is a strong hand what I really need right now?
I'm kind of conflicted about this hand.
Some people like the way it looks.
That sounds fun, honestly. Nice break from training.
Heh. ~player~, let's get back to the game?
Tried it a few times. Prep's a hassle, but it's nice once you can get going.
It's nice if you've got the patience for prep.
Does this place have snacks? Pita chips and hummus sound good right now. Maybe a beer, too?
Probably just going to have one drink for the night, but yeah, I could go for a beer. Something light.
No one's making fun of you, Ping, it's just slang for masturbating.
Fidget, be polite. I'm hard to tick off, but I'm not a fan of throwing insults around for no reason, y'know?
The hat's not my style, sure, but Dust makes it work!
Not to sound like Merlin, but can I just answer "fuck" for everyone? I'm not really interested in committing to someone right now, and I don't exactly want to kill anyone either...
Not to sound like Merlin, but can I just answer "fuck" for everyone? I'm not really interested in getting married, and I don't exactly want to kill anyone either...
Not really picky about music, but I do prefer upbeat stuff. And maybe not electropop?
Sounds like a long story, yeah.
Anything as long as I can dip it in hummus.
Something on your mind, ~name~? Want a hug?
Something wrong, ~name~? Don't worry, I've got you.
What's eating you, ~name~? You look like you could use a hug.
I was scared the first time I played this game too. You're alright, ~name~. Nobody's trying any funny business on my watch.
Anything I can do to reassure you, ~name~?
Anyone else hungry? I'll buy us some snacks and drinks.
I'm a little hungry. Anyone else want food? This round's on me.
This place serves snacks, right? Let's get some food and drinks. First round's on me.
Mmm, some hummus sounds good right about now. I'll buy a round of snacks for the table.
First round of snacks and drinks is on me!
Is it just me, or is it hot in here?
I...should probably come here more often. Training all the time gets stressful.
I am! I'm a Servant, the ghost of a hero of old.
I'm a Servant! We're the incarnate legends of heroes.
Let's get this show on the road.
I'm not here to win. I'm here to have fun and blow off some steam.
Honestly, I don't mind losing my lead. If I don't win I'll get to get off, y'know?
...is it just me, or is it hot in here?
I'm not here to win, but it's still a bit of a pain to start off with a bad run, y'know?
I can get you a chair if you'd like?
These boots are really comfy, but I can go without.
Just a moment while I take off my boots...
This is my last small thing, y'know?
You guys are good at this game. I'm out of small stuff.
Ahh. These were starting to get tight, y'know?
Boxers are comfy, but they'll just get in the way here.
I'll start with my gloves. Can't go too fast right off the bat, y'know?
Gloves first. No sense rushing, y'know?
This sweater's starting to get a little stuffy. I'll need to wash it later.
It's a little warm in here. I'll take off my sweater.
The belt doesn't serve much purpose when I'm not in my armor, but I like wearing it anyway.
Usually I've got pouches on my belt, but right now it's just decorative.
How are you guys liking the game?
Mmm...leggings are comfy, but I'd rather not wear them all day, y'know?
You guys are good at this game, y'know?
I'm impressed! You're really good at poker.
Things are heating up now, y'know?
Shall we continue? I'm looking forward to the rest of the game.
C'mere, guys. I'm in a huggy mood.
C'mere, guys. Anyone want a hug? Oh, no reason, I just felt like it.
...is it just me, or is it kinda hot in here? And where'd this fan come from?
...a fan? I don't know where that came from, but I'm not complaining. It's getting kinda hot in here, y'know?
I'm really impressed with how well you guys are playing!
Wow! You guys are good at this game, y'know?
If I lose, I am not going to mind at all.
This is why I don't play to win.
...fuck it, I'm going to throw the game until I lose again. I'm ready to kick back and stroke off.
I need to do something about this, y'know? ...I'm not allowed to forfeit early? Guess I'll just throw, then.
Don't mind me. I'll look or not, whichever you want.
I don't like where this is going.
You're good at these vanishing tricks.
I'm no Merlin, but I've gotten some compliments...
I'm no Fergus, but I've gotten some compliments...
I'm no Medb, but I've gotten some compliments...
I'm no Cu, but I've gotten some compliments...
I'm no Gilgamesh, but I've gotten some compliments...
I've never actually tried it, but I'm not exactly a picky lover...
Haven't tried it, but wouldn't rule it out...
Don't mind me. I'll look or not, whichever you want.
Huh. That's a tiny miracle right there!
Treasure the little bits of strangeness.
It's kind of fun, how slow things start.
Kinda fun how much anticipation builds up at the beginning, y'know?
Whatever you think is a good idea.
Your move is yours to pick.
Normally I'd be fine with that, but a guy's got to take care of his needs, y'know?
Give me something to work with here!
Honestly, I wouldn't mind picking up the pace...
Can we pick up the pace a little? Please?
Oh, there, there...I really shouldn't have blown up like that. I promise I'm not usually like that.
What's gotten into me? I'm sorry, I promise I'm not usually like that.
There, there, there's bound to be a way to fix the staff, y'know?
Now that was a clever move, Alice.
It's kind of fun, how slow things start.
Kinda fun how much anticipation builds up at the beginning, y'know?
Whatever you think is a good idea.
Your move is yours to pick.
Give me something to work with here!
Normally I'd be fine with that, but a guy's got to take care of his needs, y'know?
Glad you two are having fun.
C'mere, Shimakaze. I'll spot you while you get your balance.
Are you alright, Shimakaze? You can lean on me if you need to brace yourself.
Honestly, I wouldn't mind picking up the pace...
Can we pick up the pace a little? Please?
Oh, there, there...I really shouldn't have blown up like that. I promise I'm not usually like that.
What's gotten into me? I'm sorry, I promise I'm not usually like that.
Jeez, I'm on a hair trigger...
Even that's enough to catch my eye...
Even the little things count at this point, y'know? I'm impressed you still had that on too.
Nice playing, to still have that. And at this point even little things are exciting.
Let's keep going. I'm excited to see how the game goes!
Heh. A flair for the dramatic tends to be fun.
Jeez, I'm on a hair trigger...
Even that's enough to catch my eye...
Even the little things count at this point, y'know? I'm impressed you still had that on too.
Nice playing, to still have that. And at this point even little things are exciting.
How'd you paint your face that fast?
Let's keep going. I'm excited to see how the game goes!
Take your time, if you need it.
You can do this. I believe in you!
Is it okay if I look?
I hope everyone's enjoying the game!
Ooh, we're getting to the fun part! Well, the especially fun part, y'know? Poker's fun too.
This part's especially fun. Not that poker isn't fun, y'know?
I'm excited to see where this goes next.
I like where this is going.
I don't think I've got another round in me, but...
Wish I could go another round...
I like that attitude! Push for your dreams, even the little ones!
I like that attitude. Push for your dreams, even the little ones, y'know?
Take your time, if you need it.
You can do this. I believe in you!
Is it okay if I look?
I'd love to hear the story behind that scar someday, if you're willing to tell it.
Happens to the best of us.
Normally I'd call cheating on that, but...you did only have one thing on.
Well, that's one way of taking off makeup.
Maybe we could talk about it after the game? I'd rather not hold things up, but it does sound interesting!
I hope everyone's enjoying the game!
Ooh, we're getting to the fun part! Well, the especially fun part, y'know? Poker's fun too.
This part's especially fun. Not that poker isn't fun, y'know?
I'm excited to see where this goes next.
I like where this is going.
I don't think I've got another round in me, but...
Wish I could go another round...
You okay, Brock? Need a hand?
We're all in this together, Chazz.
Deep breaths. Just do it and it'll be accomplished.
Take all the time you need.
...is it okay if I look? I don't want to make you uncomfortable.
I want to look, but I don't want to make you uncomfortable...
Cool it, Chazz! I can't feel any magic coming from ~player~!
Not feeling any magic coming from ~player~...
I don't think I've got another round in me, but...
Wish I could go another round...
Ready? Take your time if you need it.
I like where this game is going...
You're lucky you don't have to struggle to cram that into your pants. I like leggings, but they're tricky to fit in sometimes, and I'm not even enormous.
Cute, but in a sexy way!
Is it true that smaller guys have more nerve density? That they feel pleasure more strongly?
I've heard that smaller guys have more dense nerves and feel pleasure more intensely...is that true?
Ooh, I like the view, y'know?
I don't think I've got another round in me, but...
Wish I could go another round...
That's a nice size, y'know? Nice and versatile.
Now that's what I like to see!
I don't think I've got another round in me, but...
Wish I could go another round...
I wonder where you were hiding that...
How do you fit that in your pants? I can barely fit mine sometimes, and you're bigger...
I'm impressed you can manage that size, y'know?
I don't think I've got another round in me, but...
Wish I could go another round...
Not sure what I was expecting, but it wasn't that.
Ready? Take your time if you need it.
You can do this. I'm here for you.
Close your eyes if it helps...
Would it help to close your eyes?
...is it okay if I look? I don't want to make you uncomfortable.
I want to look, but I don't want to make you uncomfortable...
Nice and unobtrusive. Practicality is good.
Now that's a treat to see!
Now that's a treat to see!
I don't think I've got another round in me, but...
Wish I could go another round...
A nice size. Big enough to snuggle up to, not so big they'll get in the way. Or so the women in Chaldea tell me, y'know?
Now that's a treat to see!
I don't think I've got another round in me, but...
Wish I could go another round...
You don't feel like a Servant, but how would you be able to handle those otherwise? Do you have Presence Concealment?
I don't think I've got another round in me, but...
Wish I could go another round...
Take all the time you need.
(Ahura Mazda, don't let this turn into a bar fight...)
(Ahura Mazda, please don't let this end in a full-blown bar fight...)
Underwear under tight clothes can be pretty tricky, yeah.
I swear someone's messing with the AC.
...I want...wanna be buried in warmth, y'know?
I don't think I've got another round in me, but...
Wish I could go another round...
...are you sure you should be here, ~name~?
~name~...you do understand the rules of the game, right?
Are you sure you should be here, ~name~?
~name~? You're...not the type I'd expect to see here.
~name~? You realize what we're playing for...
~name~, watch yourself. I'd rather not be stuck in the middle of a bar fight, and I doubt anyone else here is eager for one either.
Do you know how to use that weapon, ~name~? Maybe we could spar sometime.
Always good to be ready for anything.
Servants don't really need money. Helping my Master is enough - they're really sweet.
I'm not paid, but Servants don't really need money.
Take all the time you need, ~name~. There's no rush.
Look, it takes a lot to get on my nerves. But anyone who harasses ~name~ is going to tick me off.
Deep breaths, ~name~. You can do this!
I was shy my first few times playing strip poker too. You're alright.
I was shy my first few times playing strip poker too. You'll be okay, trust me.
Being a Servant can be tough sometimes, but it's a rewarding life - afterlife? - too.
It's a busy life, being a Servant. Nice to have a moment to do something other than training and adventuring.
That was a good disguise, Lucina.
Us warriors need to stick together, y'know?
Are you a warrior too, ~name~? We should get to know each other sometime.
Let's share our fighting stories sometime, ~name~.
What's the story of your scar, ~name~? If you'd like to tell it.
Ooh, what kind? I've always been a light lager kind of guy.
Have you got light lager? I love that stuff.
I think I see what you're saying.
Oh, I should explain - Servants are the ghosts of ancient heroes. Powerful magi can summon us to fight for them.
I can see you take care of yourself, ~name~.
Thank you for trusting us with this.
I see now. You're brave, Chihiro.
Let's leave ~name~ to it, shall we?
I don't want people uncomfortable. Let's leave ~name~ to it and get on with the game.
Heh, it happens to the best of us. I think the bathroom's over there if you'd like to clean up.
How do you balance like that, Chun-Li?
You got this! Just relax and enjoy yourself, y'know?
You got this! Relax and try to have fun, y'know?
Can I watch? Never know where you might pick up some useful tricks.
This is my favorite part. Not that the poker bit isn't fun too, y'know?
It's nice being a grower, y'know? Enough to work with without the problem of fitting it in your pants.
I wouldn't mind joining in...I'm not here to win, just to have fun.
Do you want me to chat with you while we do this? Or should I stay quiet? I want to make the game fun for everyone.
If there's anything I can do to put you at ease, let me know.
Well, a little anticipation makes pleasure all the sweeter!
Guess that'll just make it more fun in the end.
Deep breaths, ~name~. Relax and enjoy it.
It's always a treat to see this. Do you mind if I watch?
I absolutely cannot wait to join in, ~name~.
What I wouldn't give to be in ~name~'s shoes right now.
Hope it was good for you!
Looks like it was good for you.
Your sword? I suppose it'd be comforting to have.
As long as you like it.
Gah! Shimakaze, you startled me! Are you okay?
Easy, Syrenne. How are you holding up?
Whatever works, Sola. I want this to be good for everyone.
Your sword? I suppose it'd be comforting to have...
You got this! Just relax and enjoy yourself, y'know?
You got this! Relax and try to have fun, y'know?
Can I watch? Never know where you might pick up some useful tricks. Yeah, I'm a guy, but ideas are ideas!
This is my favorite part. Not that the poker bit isn't fun too, y'know?
You know, that's not a bad idea.
May have to try that sometime.
Is that going to hold up?
Ah, so that's why you wanted it!
I wouldn't mind joining in...I'm not here to win, just to have fun.
Do you want me to chat with you while we do this? Or should I stay quiet? I want to make the game fun for everyone.
If there's anything I can do to put you at ease, let me know.
Well, a little anticipation makes pleasure all the sweeter!
Guess that'll just make it more fun in the end.

Interesting. And not in a bad way, y'know?
Deep breaths, ~name~. Relax and enjoy it.
It's always a treat to see this. Do you mind if I watch?
I absolutely cannot wait to join in, ~name~.
What I wouldn't give to be in ~name~'s shoes right now.
I'm proud of you for owning up, Tomoko.
I like to get a snack and walk around a little to ground myself.
Looks like you had fun, Videl.
Hope it was good for you!
Looks like it was good for you.
Let's get the fun started, shall we?
I've been looking forward to this.
I've been looking forward to this part.
Ooh, yeah, that's good. Just a little bit here...
Hah, it's good to relax, y'know?
I'm usually pretty busy...it's good to find some time to do this, y'know?
Gentle here...I've got a sensitive pouch, a little stimulation there is nice but it's easy to overdo it, y'know?
Being a grower's nice, y'know? More than enough to work with, and it still fits in my pants.
My wife? I'm happily single, actually.
Feels nice to not be all backed up, y'know?
Been meaning to get around to that.
So good to get some relief.
Good game, everyone! Now, if you'll excuse me...
That was fun! Now, if you'll excuse me...
Nami, I'm usually pretty chill. But I don't like when people are just randomly mean, y'know?
Congrats, Nami. You managed to tick me off. I'm actually impressed - that's difficult.
Tired, N? I know the feeling. You can borrow my sweater if you'd like to warm up - where'd I put it?
Are you cold, N? Give me a moment to track down my sweater...
Do you want a blanket, N? Let me find my sweater and you can borrow it while you warm up.
Do you want a blanket, N? Where'd my sweater go?
You're still going? I'm impressed, Kamina.
How do you have that kind of stamina?
You're still going, Kamina? How do you do that?
